languages.text: "Формально это правда, но не совсем. Формулировка эпатажная, но на самом деле все проще и безобиднее".
"You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."
languages.original_text: "Формально это правда, но не совсем. Формулировка эпатажная, но на самом деле все проще и безобиднее".

traits.locale_text: "Strictly speaking, your confession is truthful... but not quite. The phrasing is overdramatic. In reality, things were simpler and not nearly as damning."
"Strictly speaking, your confession is truthful... but not quite. The phrasing is overdramatic. In reality, things were simpler and not nearly as damning."
"You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."
"You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."
"You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."
"You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas menti... mais vous n'avez pas non plus dit toute la vérité. Ces faits semblent choquants parce que vous les avez présentés sans contexte. »
languages.original_text: "You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas menti... mais vous n'avez pas non plus dit toute la vérité. Ces faits semblent choquants parce que vous les avez présentés sans contexte. »

languages.text: «No ha mentido... pero tampoco ha dicho toda la verdad. Estas afirmaciones suenan chocantes porque las ha presentado sin contexto».
languages.original_text: "You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."

traits.locale_text: «No ha mentido... pero tampoco ha dicho toda la verdad. Estas afirmaciones suenan chocantes porque las ha presentado sin contexto».

languages.text: “你的话是真的……但你说出的并不是全部真相。你的话听起来很让人震惊，因为你故意没说当时的具体情况。”
languages.original_text: "You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."

traits.locale_text: “你的话是真的……但你说出的并不是全部真相。你的话听起来很让人震惊，因为你故意没说当时的具体情况。”

languages.text: 「お前は嘘はついていない…。だが、真実を全ては話していない。説明が欠けているから、衝撃的に聞こえるだけだ」
languages.original_text: "You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は嘘はついていない…。だが、真実を全ては話していない。説明が欠けているから、衝撃的に聞こえるだけだ」

languages.text: "Ihr habt nicht gelogen ... Ihr habt aber auch nicht die ganze Wahrheit gesagt. Diese Behauptungen klingen schockierend, weil Ihr sie ohne Kontext in den Raum gestellt habt."
languages.original_text: "You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt nicht gelogen ... Ihr habt aber auch nicht die ganze Wahrheit gesagt. Diese Behauptungen klingen schockierend, weil Ihr sie ohne Kontext in den Raum gestellt habt."

languages.text: "Yalan söylemedin... Ama gerçeğin tamamını da söylemedin. Bu iddialar kulağa şok edici geliyor çünkü onları bağlam olmaksızın sundun."
languages.original_text: "You have not told a lie... But you have failed to tell the whole truth. These claims sound shocking because you have presented them without context."
